content.body: jsdom/whatwg-url, and thus Live URL viewer, has finally figured out its IDNA issues. Fun examples like https://jsdom.github.io/whatwg-url/#url=aHR0cHM6Ly94bi0tNC0wYmQxNTgwOGEuLi4v&base=YWJvdXQ6Ymxhbms= and https://jsdom.github.io/whatwg-url/#url=aHR0cDovL3huLS1sczhoPS8=&base=YWJvdXQ6Ymxhbms= now match the spec.
The spec PR preview links for html are in alphabetical order. Is it possible to make them be in the spec's natural order instead?
or maybe a link to an annotated ToC would be better
Domenic: oh that's great, good place to be in before Unicode considers our feedback
content.formatted_body: Domenic: oh that's great, good place to be in before Unicode considers our feedback
